name: runcon
shortDescription: run command with specified security context
longDescription: Run  COMMAND  with  completely-specified CONTEXT, or with current or transitioned security context modified by one or more of LEVEL, ROLE, TYPE, and USER.

options.name: role
options.description: Set role ROLE in the target security context.

options.name: type
options.description: Set type TYPE in the target security context.

options.name: user
options.description: Set user USER in the target security context.

options.name: range
options.description: Set range RANGE in the target security context.

options.name: compute
options.description: Compute process transition context before modifying.
